h5netcdf
========

# Available modules


The overview below shows which h5netcdf installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using h5netcdf, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load h5netcdf/1.2.0-foss-2023a
```
